name: Roo.Shadow
desc:
Simple class that can provide a shadow effect for any element.  Note that the element MUST be absolutely positioned,
and the shadow does not provide any shimming.  This should be used only in simple cases -- for more advanced
functionality that can also provide the same shadow effect, see the {@link Roo.Layer} class.

config.name: offset
config.desc: The number of pixels to offset the shadow from the element (defaults to 4)

config.name: mode
config.desc:
The shadow display mode. Supports the following options:
sides: Shadow displays on both sides and bottom only
frame: Shadow displays equally on all four sides
drop: Traditional bottom-right drop shadow (default)

methods.name: setZIndex
methods.desc: Adjust the z-index of this shadow

methods.name: isVisible
methods.desc: Returns true if the shadow is visible, else false

methods.name: show
methods.desc: Displays the shadow under the target element

params.name: targetEl
params.desc: The id or element under which the shadow should display

methods.name: realign
methods.desc:
Direct alignment when values are already available. Show must be called at least once before
calling this method to ensure it is initialized.
